title: March is Women’s History Month!
author: VD
content_html: On this day in 1906, E. Lillian Todd becomes the first woman to design and build an airplane. Unfortunately, it never flew, thus foreshadowing the revolutionary academic field of Women’s Studies.
content_text: On this day in 1906, E. Lillian Todd becomes the first woman to design and build an airplane.  Unfortunately, it never flew, thus foreshadowing the revolutionary academic field of Women’s Studies.
